unicef-e16.def: Percentage of children and young people in Grade 2 or 3 of primary education, at the end of primary education and the end of lower secondary education achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (a) reading and (b) mathematics. This indicator is SDG4 global indicator 4.1.1.
unicef-e16.name: Proportion of children in grade 2 or 3 achieving minimum proficiency level
unicef-e16.source: United Nations Statistics Division database. Last update: June 2021.
unicef-e16.dataset: United Nations Statistics Division database. Last update: June 2021.
